reviews.text:
I stopped by for a slice of pizza today while walking around in historic Colorado city, and I was thoroughly impressed!

The gentleman who took my order was super kind and professional. They moved quick despite being busy. The dining area was super cute.

I chose to take mine outside to enjoy because it was such a nice day, and the location allows for beautiful shaded bench areas with great views.

10/10 DO recommend!!

P.S. Their story is super cute too. Take the time to learn it!!

Stopped in here during a street fair in the area, they had multiple staff available to keep the wait short. Eli was behind the counter. He was phenomenal and answering questions about ingredients in pizza, in short that I did not get a spicy slice. Can‚Äôt wait to try more flavors!

Ok these guys make a pretty good slice of pizza...do I love their specials almost every time they come out with a new one, yes! But can you just grab a slice of cheese or pep and it's also amazing, absolutely! This place is always a place we bring friends and family üòÅ

We decided to check out this great place last night for the first time.  The service was awesome.  We had a very helpful and friendly person take our order and help us with menu selections.  The pizza was flavorful and loaded with delicious toppings.  We tried three different pizza slices: Big Mac, Taco and cheese.  Each were delicious and filling.  Since the place was packed we thought it would take quite a while before we were served, but it was much faster getting to us than we ever expected.  Come check it out!

Went for my son's 3rd bday all he kept asking for was pizza. This was our first time coming here and all 3 of us loved it pizza was so tasty and savory. They had had so many options to get I panicked and picked anything üòÇ but regardless it was good we are definitely coming back again
The staff was friendly and with energy everyone was smiling and laughing talking having a good time
Maybe I just came in on a good day but the atmosphere felt like walking into a family friend's house

editorial_summary.overview: Easygoing restaurant with a patio dishing up pizzas, plus subs, salads & desserts.

recentReviews.text: Our Go-To pizza... In The World! Delish!! Many choices, friendly staff, and part of profits go to a great cause! Savor the Flavor!! Yum!

Tried this spot recently, and I have to say they do a great job at mimicking New York style pizza. The flavor was on point, though the crust was a little too thin for my taste, and the pizza leaned on the salty side. That said, the atmosphere was really nice, the service was friendly and attentive, and the prices were reasonable. Overall, worth checking out if you‚Äôre craving a slice that comes close to the New York experience. 2 slices and 2 drinks were about 38 bucks.

The best pizza in sooo-long! I came here for the highest score recommended by a lot of people. They all are right. It is the best pizza in Colorado! I have to come back!!! Happy customer. No pictures, I was very hungry!
Excellent pizza, really outstanding crust.  And we love the owners' story.

We went to try out the pizza and was amazingly surprised with how good it was!! So delicious we went back the next night for supper again to try some other flavors. The Chicken Parmesan was by far the favorite. This will be our go to place when we visit the area for sure!
Super delicious pizza, great staff, and clean interior. Highly recommend to anyone looking for an amazing slice!

detailedReviews.author: P ixieStyx
detailedReviews.text: Always good

detailedReviews.author: DJ/Don Heinz
detailedReviews.text: Our Go-To pizza... In The World! Delish!! Many choices, friendly staff, and part of profits go to a great cause! Savor the Flavor!! Yum!

detailedReviews.author: Elle O
detailedReviews.text: Tried this spot recently, and I have to say they do a great job at mimicking New York style pizza. The flavor was on point, though the crust was a little too thin for my taste, and the pizza leaned on the salty side. That said, the atmosphere was really nice, the service was friendly and attentive, and the prices were reasonable. Overall, worth checking out if you‚Äôre craving a slice that comes close to the New York experience. 2 slices and 2 drinks were about 38 bucks.

detailedReviews.author: Ten Diez
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza in sooo-long! I came here for the highest score recommended by a lot of people. They all are right. It is the best pizza in Colorado! I have to come back!!! Happy customer. No pictures, I was very hungry!

detailedReviews.author: Samir Jain
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza, really outstanding crust.  And we love the owners' story.

detailedReviews.author: Cassandra Alexander
detailedReviews.text: We went to try out the pizza and was amazingly surprised with how good it was!! So delicious we went back the next night for supper again to try some other flavors. The Chicken Parmesan was by far the favorite. This will be our go to place when we visit the area for sure!

detailedReviews.author: Jay G
detailedReviews.text: Super delicious pizza, great staff, and clean interior. Highly recommend to anyone looking for an amazing slice!

detailedReviews.author: Samantha Becker
detailedReviews.text: Good but kinda pricy- the cashiers were friendly and the vibe is chill a occ classic

detailedReviews.author: Michaela Fixl
detailedReviews.text:
I stopped by for a slice of pizza today while walking around in historic Colorado city, and I was thoroughly impressed!

The gentleman who took my order was super kind and professional. They moved quick despite being busy. The dining area was super cute.

I chose to take mine outside to enjoy because it was such a nice day, and the location allows for beautiful shaded bench areas with great views.

10/10 DO recommend!!

P.S. Their story is super cute too. Take the time to learn it!!

detailedReviews.author: M Burch
detailedReviews.text: Very busy, even on a Sunday evening. Someone bought the slices we had our eye on.....waited 5 minutes for very fresh delicious üòã  pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Justin T
detailedReviews.text: This is hands down the BEST pizza in Colorado. We went here while visiting over the weekend and the service was amazing and all the flavors of pizza we got were truly delicious. If you are looking for good pizza in the area look no further, this is it!

detailedReviews.author: Issac Dunham
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza and high variety

detailedReviews.author: Jonathan Grimm
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in colorado springs. This is actually new York pizza. I'm a native new Yorker. I'm actually qualified to give an opinion on this. ü§£

detailedReviews.author: Kendra Morrissette
detailedReviews.text: This is a great spot! Lots of inside seating with plenty of room for strollers if you‚Äôre traveling with kids. Also a very clean bathroom. Lots of different pizza options that are all delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Jim L
detailedReviews.text: wow, the pizza was amazing. I had a chicken bacon ranch that was like a deep dish but with a focaccia-like crust that was incredible. I also got a slice of pepperoni thin crust that was above average. will definitely come back!

detailedReviews.author: lay jordan
detailedReviews.text: the food was okay, but i waited 25 mins in store past my pickup time just for my $40 large pizza to be cold and my garlic knots room temp at best. on vacation from out of town and was trying this for the first time because i heard it was the best. unfortunately slightly disappointed. i'm sure i would've enjoyed it more if it was hot and fresh. the service was good though and the people were friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Bobby
detailedReviews.text: Great spot to grab a slice! I work next door at the barbershop and every employee is always so nice and will even bring our orders over to us while we are working. I recommend trying their pickle pizza when they have it in!

detailedReviews.author: Nekoda Fleming
detailedReviews.text: it's really good pizza

detailedReviews.author: Cam Ryan
detailedReviews.text: Great place to grab a slice

detailedReviews.author: Harsh Sharma
detailedReviews.text:
Best Vegan Pizza I ever had.
Thank you for accommodating us coming late and for keeping the vegan/vegetarian options

detailedReviews.author: Gloria Newsom
detailedReviews.text: The chicken bacon ranch pizza was great, and the recovery rebel pizza was even better!

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Eggleston
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza with a great cause

detailedReviews.author: Rev Buddy Greene
detailedReviews.text: Tasty but expensive

detailedReviews.author: Mike McLain
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Colorado Springs.

detailedReviews.author: Errin Jones
detailedReviews.text: Wow.  This may be the best pizza I've had in Colorado.  Had the hangover,  highly recommend!!!

detailedReviews.author: Dustin Semeniuk
detailedReviews.text: 10/10 highly recommend. Little greasy but a little napkin dab was fine .

detailedReviews.author: Cooper Tracy
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely wonderful service! The staff have great recommendations, and are so welcoming! Definitely worth the stop!

detailedReviews.author: Joe T
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is good but not $8.60 per slice good. The slice is reheated, which is understandable but it was left in the oven to long. The crust so hard it will break your teeth off.  smh

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Trocke
detailedReviews.text: Incredibly slow for by the slice. They don't just give you your pizza. They charge about $8 a slice then you have to wait over 10 minutes for it even though the pizza slices are right there. Won't be back!

detailedReviews.author: Christine B
detailedReviews.text: I have tried it a few times. It‚Äôs just nothing special and extremely overpriced

detailedReviews.author: Nia Indelicato
detailedReviews.text: Best gluten free pizza I have ever had-seriously! The crust was phenomenal! I was visiting the CO Springs area, and I‚Äôm GF. I saw that this place had GF crust and was near where I was sightseeing that day. SO GLAD I checked them out. So very delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Emily Whitby
detailedReviews.text: I hate to write a bad review but we had pretty bad service. Ordered a pizza that was delivered an hour after expected delivery, stone cold, with a broken ‚Äúfreshness seal‚Äù. $50 for a cold pizza is crazy.

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Brusuelas
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza but insane to charge $1.50 for a small cup of ranch. Wasn‚Äôt even good ranch

detailedReviews.author: Trina Hall
detailedReviews.text: Sophie's is delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Sheyenne Wales
detailedReviews.text: Came for the food, here to rave about the options and service. I unfortunately didn‚Äôt get the name of the gentleman who served us but boy was he good at his job. We came here on 7/20 roughly around 5pm. The gentleman was so patient with us deciding what to order while being pleasantly overwhelmed with options and he even knew what I wanted to eat before I said it. The atmosphere inside was so pleasant although we opted to sit outside. I love the number of ciders and sours to choose from, those are my favorite! We opted to get a cider, beer, three slices, and garlic knots. This was the best pizza I‚Äôve had in a while. The portions were so big for the price, we couldn‚Äôt even finish everything. We will make this a staple when in the area, thank you all for a great experience!

detailedReviews.author: Leslie Crittenden
detailedReviews.text: Awesome service and great pizza for on the go or by the slice. Perfect for a night in or quick lunch!

detailedReviews.author: Mama Harmony
detailedReviews.text: A big yum! Great, helpful service and quick, tasty pizza! üçï

detailedReviews.author: Kevan Jacobs
detailedReviews.text: Perfect. Pretty hard to beat. World class, up there with the best pizza I've had anywhere in the country.

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Wigle-Harris
detailedReviews.text: They offer a variety of slices. We tried a Sofia slice and chicken Parm. Both were great! We also had the delicious garlic knots and a Caesar  that was fantastic! Quick service and friendly staff.

detailedReviews.author: Olivia Castruita
detailedReviews.text: Quite honestly the best pizza I have ever had! Expensive, but totally worth every penny! We got the garlic knots, but as soon as that pizza touched the table, it was gone before the knots!  The pizza was delicious! Would recommend 100%!!

detailedReviews.author: Dedleh Auntea-fa
detailedReviews.text: food is always good here and staff are so friendly and attentive.

detailedReviews.author: Jovian Turnbull
detailedReviews.text: Pound for pound best slices of pizza in the springs no question. 10/10

detailedReviews.author: Loyd Warner
detailedReviews.text: Super nice employees with good recommendations. The food was excellent.I did sit outside and they even brought me water for my dog.

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Martin
detailedReviews.text: They are always friendly, I truly enjoy there pizza, but it really does depend on the staff that day weather there‚Äôs an actual slice selection or weather that pizza is forced old and no fresh pizzas coming up. Would definitely be more successful if you guys held your whole staff to same level of accountability and ensuring customers have fresh pizzas coming or available to choose from

detailedReviews.author: Omer Roffe
detailedReviews.text: ◊ò◊¢◊ô◊ù ◊†◊ó◊û◊ì ◊ó◊û◊ï◊ì

detailedReviews.author: Noah Klimek
detailedReviews.text: Great food, friendly people. Good prices as well. Totally worth going.

detailedReviews.author: Rebecca Gutierrez
detailedReviews.text:
I forgot my phone so I do not have pictures.
However, DO NOT MISS THIS PLACE!!!

They have a great mission supporting their daughter Sophia and others with special needs medical conditons.

I read the reviews and wasn't sure if this was really where we wanted to go because we were from out of town, but I'm glad we did!!

They have a ton of pizzas to choose from ready to choose. They them toss them into the oven to warm them up and then they bring them to your table! This is true NYC style!

Dukee reviews talked about the pizza being burnt, the bottom has a perfect wood fired look to it, it isn't burnt! Maybe Pizza Hut was more that guys style. ü§Æ

Some reviews talk about it being over priced. I disagree. The ingredients are high quality you can taste! $8 or there about and your full off of one slice of loaded pizza. That's cheaper than your McD's bag of trash and you won't be hungry again in thirty minutes. ü§ó

We ordered:
‚Ä¢ 2 Cannoli
‚Ä¢ 3 The works
‚Ä¢ The Sophia
‚Ä¢ 2 Mountain Man
‚Ä¢ The Colorado

The ranch is top tier!
The cannoli was good.
Staff was so patient and helpful!!
Would visit and highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Dawn Carlson
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Colorado Springs. Can get it by the slice or by the pie.  Great unique combinations.

detailedReviews.author: Kate Reimer
detailedReviews.text: Best Za in COS!

detailedReviews.author: C T
detailedReviews.text:
I got the Sofia pizza and added mushrooms and a side of ranch to dip my crust into‚Äîand the sins I would commit to have another slice of that pizza again tonight. But alas, I was just visiting Colorado Springs, so I‚Äôm out of luck. But I know exactly where my first stop will be once I visit the area again.

10/10 would recommend.

detailedReviews.author: peter wilson
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town. I regularly stop after a trip to the mountains. The Sofia is the best tasting slice of pizza created by humankind. Please do us all a favor and line up along the slices and decide what you want while you are waiting. There is not a lot of room, and I've seen families line up into the dining room when we could all fit by the kitchen...

detailedReviews.author: Raymond Magallon
detailedReviews.text: What a day! We stopped in on a whim and they were SLAMMED! The lady working the counter crushed it though and with a smile. Not our first time w slice 420, first time eating IN at slice 420, and we'll definitely be back.

detailedReviews.author: Natalia Barford
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was great, Hawaiian was my favorite the slices are big, a bit expensive $8 for each slice. Great and friendly service

detailedReviews.author: Justin Waples
detailedReviews.text: Service and setting were great. Price of $8 to $10 per slice and $40 for a whole pizza is ridiculous. It wasn't that special. Ok for a single person who doesn't mind wasting money. But, for a family. There are better options. Pizza was nothing special worth $40. Passable. Meaning I passed it 30 minutes later.

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Creitz
detailedReviews.text:
Good pizza but except to wait 15-30 minutes for your pizza even if there‚Äôs no one in the place.

Place is decently pricy but it‚Äôs very tasty.

detailedReviews.author: ismael jimenez jr
detailedReviews.text: We had the mountain man it was delicious

detailedReviews.author: Jared Livingston
detailedReviews.text: They have great pizza slices, and the garlic knots were fantastic!

detailedReviews.author: Christopher McMall
detailedReviews.text: Great slice of pizza and really good house salad . Definitely should try it if you're in town.

detailedReviews.author: Victor V
detailedReviews.text: Overpriced and even charged me for using a CC. Not going back

detailedReviews.author: Crystal Stolte
detailedReviews.text: Large pizza slices that taste amazing! The friendliest staff!

detailedReviews.author: Anna Dugan
detailedReviews.text: Super friendly staff, best pizza I've had in Colorado and a large variety of toppings.

detailedReviews.author: Erik Racz
detailedReviews.text: The staff is very friendly and they didn‚Äôt mind our silly questions. Food is exceptional: the ‚Äúrecovery rebel‚Äù slice has a perfect ratio of heat,  sweetness and freshness. The crust is crunchy and not burned. Definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to grab a quick bite and yet get a very high quality pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Kristie Charlson
detailedReviews.text: Very flavorful pizza! Great friendly staff and beautiful atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: crap guy
detailedReviews.text: This will be my new go to place. The best pizza in the springs by far. The pizza was fresh, had a nice under carriage crunch, and the best cheese pull. If you havnt been here you are missing out!

detailedReviews.author: Barry Filerman
detailedReviews.text: Stopped here on a visit from Chicago. Amazing Pizza. Barbacoa Pizza was outstanding as well as The Spicy Pickle. Service was excellent and the story behind this place feels your heart as you're eating the pizza highly recommended

detailedReviews.author: Dalan Neuenschwander
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in the Springs. Eli and the bearded and pierced gentleman (didn‚Äôt get a name) both treated me far better than I deserved. I hope both of them have long, successful, healthy and fulfilled lives.

detailedReviews.author: Amber Livingston
detailedReviews.text: It was good, but having just been to Brooklyn, not quite that. And it‚Äôs pretty pricey. I would go here again, but not frequently.

detailedReviews.author: James O'Brien
detailedReviews.text: Excellent NY Style Pizza without the NYC Attitude. Friendly Staff. Just a bit pricy.

detailedReviews.author: Dollar Metta
detailedReviews.text: The food is amazing here, the staff is super friendly, everything I can ask for in a NY pizza place

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Tafoya
detailedReviews.text: I have to say this was some of the best pizza I have had.. the vibe was perfect the owner was so nice explaining the menu and the cause on why they are in colorado üëèüèª and you got to try The cannolis ü§§

detailedReviews.author: Sol Hj
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza, 10/10!

detailedReviews.author: Pax Kivimae
detailedReviews.text: Unparalleled food and atmosphere.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.5/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the wide variety of delicious pizza options, including unique flavors like Chicken Parmesan and pickle pizza. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and professional staff enhance the dining experience, making customers feel welcomed and valued. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

The restaurant's charming location in historic Colorado city, with beautiful outdoor seating options and a clean, inviting interior, adds to the overall dining experience. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and cold food upon pickup or delivery - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Perception of being overpriced - social media marketing can improve this area
Negative reviews about service inconsistency and pricing - review management can address this concern

positive.author: Ten Diez
positive.text: The best pizza in sooo-long! I came here for the highest score recommended by a lot of people. They all are right. It is the best pizza in Colorado! I have to come back!!! Happy customer. No pictures, I was very hungry!

neutral.text: Tried this spot recently, and I have to say they do a great job at mimicking New York style pizza. The flavor was on point, though the crust was a little too thin for my taste, and the pizza leaned on the salty side. That said, the atmosphere was really nice, the service was friendly and attentive, and the prices were reasonable. Overall, worth checking out if you‚Äôre craving a slice that comes close to the New York experience. 2 slices and 2 drinks were about 38 bucks.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
